attributes.action: Make St Georges Day a Bank Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Owe it to our proud nation to make St George's Day a Public Bank Holiday.

The Scottish Celebrate St Andrew's Day, The Irish celebrate St Patrick's day, It is about time, we made St George's Day a Public Bank Holiday.

Union Jack's should festoon every Public Building, and We should take the time to celebrate everything that is good about Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
